name: Danganronpa: CHECKMATE
description:
Install instructions

Danganronpa: Checkmate is a non-profit, fanmade spinoff of the Danganronpa series. We have no association with Spike Chunsoft, NISA or the official Danganronpa brand.

Created by Kokkun and bazileaf.

This was made as part of a one-month writing challenge in the Fanganronpa community, and it is considered complete. The game will not progress past the prologue.

Both creators have their respective Fanganronpas too! If you would like to check out their work on a bigger scale, see Danganronpa: (He)Artless Deceit and Danganronpa: Deadication.
